post.description: Posts the updated Violation Detail consisting of the detail and cause type
post.summary: Adds new detail and cause to violation

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

causeType.description: The root cause of the violation.

modificationTime.description: The modified time of the violation you are intending to update. This field will be used to validate that the violation being updated has not already been altered by someone else.

violationDetail.title: Further details on the violation, this will include any transactions or positions that are part of the violation

400.description: Aladdin® will not process the request due to an apparent client error.

code.description: A short mnemonic reference code for the error.

message.description: A human readable description of the error.

VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID.description: The unique identifier assigned by the client to the request that originated this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-Timestamp.description: Timestamp assigned to this response, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.

401.description: Aladdin® will not process the request as the necessary credentials were not provided or were invalid.

code.description: A short mnemonic reference code for the error.

message.description: A human readable description of the error.

VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID.description: The unique identifier assigned by the client to the request that originated this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-Timestamp.description: Timestamp assigned to this response, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.

403.description: Aladdin® understood the request but is refusing to authorize it.

code.description: A short mnemonic reference code for the error.

message.description: A human readable description of the error.

VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID.description: The unique identifier assigned by the client to the request that originated this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-Timestamp.description: Timestamp assigned to this response, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.

404.description: Aladdin® did not find the resource requested or is unwilling to disclose if it exists. Could indicate a defect in the client program or data which is no longer accessible.

code.description: A short mnemonic reference code for the error.

message.description: A human readable description of the error.

VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID.description: The unique identifier assigned by the client to the request that originated this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-Timestamp.description: Timestamp assigned to this response, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.

post.description: Posts the Violation after the updates are done
post.summary: Updates certain fields of the violation

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

modificationTime.description: The last modified time of the violation you are intending to update. This field will be used to validate that the violation being updated has not already been altered by someone else.

resolutionComment.description: Resolution comments for the violation. Appended to existing comments.

resolutionStatus.title: State to move this violation to. Valid values are - Action Required, Action Taken, Working & Closed

violationDisposition.description: This value is populated when a violation is being closed.

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsCompliancePositionSource.description:
- COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified position source
 - COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_ORDER: The position source is order
 - COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_TRADE: The position source is trade
 - COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_POSITION: The position source is position
 - COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_NEW_CASH: The position source is new cash
 - COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_MISC_CASH: The position source is misc cash
 - COMPLIANCE_POSITION_SOURCE_COMMITTED_CASH: The position source is committed cash
enumsCompliancePositionSource.title: Enumeration of position source for compliance transactions

enumsComplianceResolutionsState.description:
- COMPLIANCE_RESOLUTIONS_STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value
 - COMPLIANCE_RESOLUTIONS_STATE_ACTION_REQUIRED: The resolutions state is Action Required
 - COMPLIANCE_RESOLUTIONS_STATE_ACTION_TAKEN: The resolutions state is Action Taken
 - COMPLIANCE_RESOLUTIONS_STATE_WORKING: The resolutions state is Working
 - COMPLIANCE_RESOLUTIONS_STATE_CLOSED: The resolutions state is Closed
enumsComplianceResolutionsState.title: Enumeration of possible resolutions state

enumsComplianceSeverity.description:
- COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_WARNING: The severity is warning
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_RESTRICTION: The severity is restriction
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_SILENT_ALARM: The severity is silent alarm.
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_SECURITY_LANDING: The severity is security landing.
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_TIMING_ISSUE: The severity is timing issue.
 - COMPLIANCE_SEVERITY_GAIN_LOSS_SENSITIVE: The severity is Gain/Loss sensitive.
enumsComplianceSeverity.title: Enumeration of possible severity

v1Violation.description: Violation describes the intraday and overnight violation generated at time of the compliance breach...

violationDate.description: The date when this violation occurred.

portfolioId.description: Aladdin unique numeric portfolio id, e.g. -1123.

ruleAssignmentName.description: Name given to a mapping (assignment) between a compliance rule and a portfolio in Aladdin.

ruleId.description: A unique name for a rule which is violated.

complianceSeverity.description: The compliance severity of the violation.

offender.description: The offender of the violation, e.g. the Issuer, Security, Country or Currency etcetera that is in violation of the rule.

violationDetail.description: The detail of a violation. This will include any transactions or positions that are part of the violation.

violationDisposition.description: The current  disposition of the violation. This will be populated for closed violations and include values such as Approved, Rejected, Manual etc.

violationOwner.description: The current team or group who owns the next step in resolving this violation.

actionStatus.description: The current action status of the violation. This will be populated with values such as Closed, Action Required, Action Taken.

resolutionComment.description: The current resolution comment for the violation which has been populated by a user.

violationContributions.description: One or more allocations which contributed to the violation. Each violation is caused by one or more underlying positions.

creationTime.description: This records the latest timestamp when the item is entered or updated.

modifier.description: The user who last modified the violation.

lastModifiedTime.title:
The last time when violations was updated.
(-- api-linter: core::0142::time-field-names=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because this is the correct field name --)

v1ViolationContribution.description: Violation Contribution describes one or more allocations which contributed to the violation. Each violation is caused by one or more underlying positions.

transactionDate.description: The date on which the transaction took place.

allocationQuantity.description: Size of the allocation, dependent on the asset class of the security. e.g. in the case of equities, this will be the number of shares. Sign indicates the direction of the transaction.

portfolioId.description: Aladdin unique numeric portfolio id, e.g. -1123.

compliancePositionSource.description: The source of the position like ORD for orders and TRD for trades.

v1ViolationDetail.title: Details, cause type and last modified time fields from a Compliance Violation

causeType.description: The root cause of the violation.

violationDetail.title: Further details on the violation, this will include any transactions or positions that are part of the violation

modificationTime.description: The modified time of the violation you are intending to update. This field will be used to validate that the violation being updated has not already been altered by someone else.

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
